response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a competitive edge in your market while maximizing efficiency and profitability. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making a decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
